lead_paragraph: Bayern Munich coach Pep Guardiola is determined to win the Champions League for a third time but will not be judged a failure even if he leaves at the end of the season without lifting Europe's biggest prize again.

headline.print_headline: Don't Judge Me on Champions League Alone, Says Guardiola
headline.main: Don't Judge Me on Champions League Alone, Says Guardiola

snippet: Bayern Munich coach Pep Guardiola is determined to win the Champions League for a third time but will not be judged a failure even if he leaves at the end of the season without lifting Europe's biggest prize again....
